feature-1.title: High Experience
feature-1.content: We have more than 20 years of experience in dental treatments.

feature-2.title: Expert Team
feature-2.content: We put an end to dental disorders with our specialist physicians.

feature-3.title: High Standard
feature-3.content: We consider even the smallest detail for our valuable patients.

about-us.title: Dentbul Dental Clinic Turkey
about-us.content: Dentbul Oral and Dental Health has been serving for more than 10 years on the European side of Istanbul, at the junction of the Asian and European continents, with the departments of Aesthetics, Implant, Zirconium and All Dental Treatments. In line with our company policy, we have been working for the satisfaction of our patients with Oral and Dental Health problems for more than 10 years, for zero problems and high level patient satisfaction.

form.title: Free Consultation
form.sub-title: After filling out the form, we will go throught with you as soon as possible.

Thank you for contacting us.
We will contact you as soon as possible.

quiz.title: Lets start to create your free plan
quiz.description: Hello, you can solve the test below, which takes 20 seconds to learn the treatment prices you are wondering about, see the before and after images and win a gift from Turkey's largest clinic ðŸ™‚

loading.title: Your free super plan is being prepared for you.
loading.completed: The super plan we have created for you is ready.
loading.stage2: Appropriate plan is created according to your choices
loading.stage3: You are given free additional transactions that you can use for your choices.

q.q: Which stage would you like to continue with?
q.loading: Your preferences are being evaluated for analysis.

q1.q: Do you have any problems with your teeth?
q1.loading: Your preferences are being evaluated for analysis.
q1.a2: No my teeth are completely healthy

q2.q: What dental problems are you experiencing now or before?
q2.loading: Your preferences are being evaluated for analysis.

q3.q: When are you planning to come to Istanbul?
q3.loading: Your preferences are being evaluated for analysis.

q4.q: Will you come to Istanbul alone or with a friend or partner?
q4.note: We're asking this because we're going to gift her/him teeth whitening.
q4.loading: Your preferences are being evaluated for analysis.

q5.q: We would like to pick you up from the airport in a luxury vehicle and let you stay in our own hotel. Is this right for you?
q5.loading: Your preferences are being evaluated for analysis.

q6.q: How many days will you stay in Istanbul?
q6.loading: Your preferences are being evaluated for analysis.

q7.q: Would a guide about the historical places of Istanbul make you happy?
q7.loading: Your preferences are being evaluated for analysis.

q8.note: How would you like us to send you our price list and the details of the gift you won?
q8.loading: Your preferences are being evaluated for analysis.

complete.completed: The super plan we have created for you is ready, and we have added a special gift voucher to the plan. Please fill out the information below to be able to offer you this plan for free.
complete.note: You don't need to be confused, we planned everything from the day you came to Istanbul to the date you will come back. Price, gifts, accomodation, city tour and more...Get this plan with a gift now.. The plan will be deleted in a half an hour.
complete.congrats: Congrats you're the {{count}}.th person who have just created free plan in an hour. You can get your free teeth whitening in our Clinics.
complete.personal: Your personal guidence Selin is ready to help you whenever you want.
complete.final: If you have additional questions, you can ask questions by connecting to our Free Whatsapp line from the link below.

buttons.button-2: Create Your Journey, See the Price

journey.title: Travel Plan FOR FREE!
journey.description: We'll make a travel plan for you. Let's get it started with 8 simple question and then you'll be ready!
